website_summaries.verdict: A powerful masticating juicer that can handle everything from fruits and veggies to leafy greens and wheatgrass; it even makes nut butters and pasta.
pros: Operates at low speed to reduce heat and oxidation
Boasts a high juice yield and continuous juicing thanks to the automatic pulp-ejection function
Can grind coffee, mince herbs, and make nut butters and milks
cons: Can clog when juicing some fruits, like oranges and grapefruit

customer_reviews.title: Not good! Engine burned after 5 uses!! Seller ignored me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer I May and after 8 months and 5 times using it , the engine burned out for no reason in the middle of working process. I was trying to contact seller but they didn’t respond it’s already been couple of weeks. Don’t buy this juicer especially from this seller! It was $300 when I bought it and they promote that their warranty is 15 years. That’s obviously not true. I’m really upset and disappointed with this purchase. I end up buying Slowstar 2000 from Tribest juicer. And it’s so much better!!! Easier to use and clean and doesn’t clog itself at all. Faster but with without worming the juice. Omega was warming the juice a lot!
customer_reviews.author: olyanebo

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked on this project exceptionally well. The only reason for a less you're reading is that the feeding tube is much too small. Maybe not much too small, but at least an inch too small. I feel that you should be able to fit in at least a quarter of a lemon. That's this chefs opinion...
customer_reviews.author: chuckh

customer_reviews.title: Known issue with motor-amazon did not replace when notified.
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday and unpacked it this morning. I started with simple wheatgrass and midway through the first handful the machine made a loud POP. I turned it off and called omega directly. The were very helpful and are sending ups to pick it up and sending me a new one. They told me this was a known issue in the 8008 but they did a recall and corrected the issue. Amazon just didnt comply with the ones in their stock. So...if you order it, they're beautiful-easy to use and clean, but be prepared to receive one and return it straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stoltenberg

customer_reviews.title: The best juicer I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it daily and love it. Nothing works better for green juices. I am drinking a daily mixture of kale or some other leafy green along with carrots and apple. I have had perhaps a dozen juicers over the years, but nothing has worked well with leafy greens. Also, the other types of juices really aerates the juice too much and waste a lot of the green juice. I purchased this to supplement my diet with more green juice. This machine is tough enough to have replaced my other juicers for now. I am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love juicing....
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is AWESOME!! It’s quiet and it gets the job done. Before my juicer I was using my various ninja blenders, etc. It was soooo thick and fibery (yep, just made up that word) in the ninja. The juicer gives me what I want, juice. This far I’ve done celery, carrots, and collards.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Hubby here. No mysogyny intended. I am the main juicer early mornings. The machine works well. maybe apples are not as reduced as Evie would prefer. But overall it has been reliable and a worthy purchase. (I just wish the boss would choose more flavorful combos of fruits to supplement the veggies.)
customer_reviews.author: john R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Used, dirty and did not work
customer_reviews.text: First time buying something used and will not try that again. The item was not clean when unpacked. When it was put together it did not work, took it apart, checked the instructions and reassembled it and still nothing. Obviously no one checked this juicer when it was returned before. I won't take a chance on something listed as used again.
customer_reviews.author: Hui Sun

customer_reviews.title: Bad juicer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one not even 5 minutes into putting apples in juicer smoke started to come out and stopped working Called amazon for a replacement and samething happen not buying this juicer anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime coronado jr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but willing to try another one
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get my new Omega 8008 to start juicing for the first time. On the first use within 5 minutes, it started smoking from the back. I took it apart, cleaned it and tried it again, it continued to smoke & the auger stopped working. I’m very disappointed. I’ve heard nothing but great reviews on Omega. Not sure if that one was a lemon or not. I’m going to return it & purchase another one, to give it a try again.
customer_reviews.author: Msmissy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent masticating juicer, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for almost 4 weeks now. Been juicing every day once, sometimes twice each day. I am thoroughly happy with it. I'd say juicing takes about 15-20 minutes tops to make the juice and clean up the parts. I make about 2 pints per session. The juice that results is very delicious, and the machine appears to be very efficient extracting the juice as the remaining pulp is extremely dry. Also the machine, being a horizontally layed out, fits conveniently on the counter top. I would recommend this juicer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this powerful juicer
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this powerful juicer. Excellent quality and juicing with dry substance discharge, meaning it literally got all the juice out of the produce!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Magic

customer_reviews.title: Love This Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love, love,love this juicer........so easy to clean, assemble, and clean. It doesn't sit in my cupboard, have been using it because its such an easy juicer to use. Have had several juicers in the past, but this one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Really good machine. New morning ritual
customer_reviews.text: Really good machine. New morning ritual! Filter-thingy gets clogged with lemon or garlic but that's understandable... Inspired by Sprouts (of Tahoe) we now have a 'hot shot' every morning (grass, ginger, lemon and hot spice). Recommended by a guy who hates most things!
customer_reviews.author: M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: just pick this one
customer_reviews.text: best juicer bro better than vert and twin augers in my opinion, atleast cost-wise (twin auger)
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected for the high price.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was fantastic. However, this juicer Omega 8008 doesn't work properly. It makes a loud sound squeaking sound when on (no food was in chute, it shouldn't do that) & the filter area is so tiny on this thing (see pic) that when juice is pressed it cannot go thru the filter after a short period due to build up of pulp that didn't get pushed out at the end. (P.S. the juice quality is amazing when it actually comes out). Also on the design, it looks like a sewing machine, not a juicer. I ordered the Omega VRT, hopefully that will work better & I'll update. :)
customer_reviews.author: OC88

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing juicer. I juice about 15 lbs of veggies ...
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing juicer. I juice about 15 lbs of veggies once a week and have juice prepped for the whole week sitting in my fridge and ready to go. I feel healthy as f**k. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Mason

customer_reviews.title: STILL NOT BPA FREE
customer_reviews.text: Still NOT BPA FREE i will return my order immediately, i thought this 8008 is BPA FREE but when i received my order the warning for BPA is still written in the box
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cabalo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed the nozzles do not fit
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed the nozzles do not fit. That was the whole point of me getting this particular juicer, because of its versatility. Now I can't use it for that. Otherwise everything else is functional. No issues with the juicer its self.
customer_reviews.author: natosha

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is a challenge because you have to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is a challenge because you have to cut the produce up into small pieces to put it in the chute. I wish I had sent it back but now am selling it at a huge loss and will buy a commercial one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my omega juicer. However, clogs up with oranges, grapefruits and pineapples very easily. But overall decent product
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Very effective juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to juice a variety of fruits and vegetables. Works well. We drink celery juice daily and is pulp free.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST JUICER I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new juicer! It’s super simple to use and cleanup is quick. Thanks for the great service and wonderful product.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Provides clear juice, unlike the high speed blender types that yield a smoothie type product. Easy to use. It is large so storage needs to be a consideration. If you have the room, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: LNT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: After much research we chose the 8008. Very pleased with ease of use. Does a super job and highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: product review
customer_reviews.text: I had a very positive experience. The quality and price were excellent. I would recommend this product I had o return the product because I am unable to cook for myself for some time. The return process went very smoothly.

customer_reviews.title: Just know that it's not chrome, it's chrome-colored plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It works great but I didn't know it was made of plastic. : /

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, love it.... Makes making baby food a breeze. We now make all our own gluten free pasta thanks to this juicer! Wheatgrass and other herbs do well also.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this juicer! Simple to use and easy to clean. I recommend you but Crazy Sexy Juice by Kris Carr as well, has lots of great recipes. Happy juicing!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Juicer, would recommend to anyone looking to improve their health!
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer ever. Single handedly the best and wisest purchase I have ever made. This has dramatically changed my life for the better! Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my juicer! I use it almost every day! Very happy with the quality.

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect. It juices leafy greens well
customer_reviews.text: This juicer absolutely exceeded my expectations! I researched long and wide to find the right juicer for my needs, and this is perfect. It juices leafy greens well, wheatgrass awesome, fruits and vegetables, and much much more, and its super easy to clean and reassemble! This juicer makes juicing fun & easy!

customer_reviews.text: After much searching and reading reviews I decided to go with the Omega 8008 and couldn't be happier. It was easy to put together and easy to clean.

It delivers wonderful juice with a touch of pulp or simply use the supplied screen if pulp-free is your preference . Pluses : 1. Easy to use 2. Easy to clean 3. Very powerful and quiet motor 4. Beautiful cold press design Cons: Very heavy .( ask your husband to carry and put away. )

customer_reviews.text: It does make juice fine. but I have several plastic parts used to make pasta that have hair line cracks. I tried to make almond butter with it, but it's real a big mess and a lot of reprocessing work.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money I wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: I want to return this juicer. Please advise How do I return it I am very disappointed in this juicer It clogs very easily, the screen hunks up easily I bought it to juice greens and even when chopped small at a slow pace It clogs. I've read the juice doesn't not separate. It ALWAYS. Separates those reviews must be written by family of the company. I can't see why anyone would like this thing I would return it but I no longer have the box
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool for your kitchen and the best way to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool for your kitchen and the best way to make juices for your family. I also make almond butter every Sunday with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Juicer
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction, great juicer, easy cleaning. Not real loud. Arrived early and undamaged. I would recommend juicer to friends.
customer_reviews.author: BLuna

customer_reviews.title: very good juicer
customer_reviews.text: this machine is without peer. Ive been juicing my ass off. literally losing weight like a big dog. only drawback is feed slot could be a little bit bigger. still functional.
customer_reviews.author: whatshislips

customer_reviews.title: The product would be great if it came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product would be great if it came as advertised. When I got the juicer, the part that is used for juicing was missing. All that came with my juicer was the part for making pasta. When I read the list of parts in the instruction manual the juicing end cap was listed but missing. When I tried to contact the seller, I got NO response. If you want a good potential juicer this is the one. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Juicing soft fruits and soft vegetables causes a pulp jam in the auger when done juicing. Inserting more fruit / veg will not unstuck the jammed pulp. Making frozen fruit ice cream causes a fruit ice jam at the nozzle and the frozen matter will flow backwards. And later when the ice jam thaws out at the nozzle, it released the built up pressure, and the ice cream explode out so fast it shoots the ice cream out 4 feet making a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Roberet Lew

customer_reviews.title: I bought this particular model because it was supposed to be better for juicing greens
customer_reviews.text: I studied the different juicers out there before buying this one. I bought this particular model because it was supposed to be better for juicing greens. While it makes great juices, the chute which you put the fruits and vegetables down to make the juice is really small so you need to cut most items, like apples, pears, etc. Celery and cucumbers do not need to be cut, but more often than not I am making fruit juices. If you don't mind the extra work, then I recommend this model. Otherwise, I recommend getting an upright Omega with a wider chute.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Juicer Motor Broken Right out of Box
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to my daughter. She got it all set up for the first time, with fruits and veggies all chopped up, went to turn it on and nothing. The juicer's motor is broken. I have reached out to the seller to see if they will help me repair or exchange for another unit. Hopefully they will respond and be able to help me resolve this issue. Very sad that it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the miney
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit a while back, but felt it was time to put in my two cents...built to last, strong motor, makes great juices and butters, has a easy clean up, and seems to still be going strong. Cons for the unit are it does not like too soft of fruits...the screen on the juicer get clogged when too soft of fruit is used...I have got around this flaw by doing a soft fruit and theN following up with a crunchy veggie or fruit...would buy againnin heart beat
customer_reviews.author: manatee_lver1

customer_reviews.title: Delicious stuff that heals your guts
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Try this: juice one bunch of flatleaf parsley, half a beet (any color but red gives a great color), half a cucumber (I peel the waxy skin off), and one or two celery stalks. I don't use the optional foam screen. After you juice it all into a coffee cup, stir it to mix the layers. There will be a fine "sediment" of parsley that has a delicate fluffy texture. Drink immediately. Well worth the money for this parsley fluff feeling.
customer_reviews.author: cinead

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. It's easy to use and clean. The juicer works very well and the pulp is practically dry when juicing fruits and veggies. This guarantees you get the most juice from your produce. The product comes with a little brush to brush off any pulp that can stick to the inner crevices of the machine while cleaning. Overall I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer.  Get One!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what a nice machine. I had been using another juicing machine for a few month before it broke down. The amount of juice yield from that machine was not great, as the pulp still very moist. I thought that was how juicing machine work, until I got this Omega 8008 juicer. The juice yield is much better than I thought, and most importantly, this machine is quiet and almost vibration free. LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Golden Cuspid

customer_reviews.title: I really like this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer, but it does create more foam than I thought it would. Also, I wonder why some juice keeps creeping into where the auger is turning? Maybe I am feeding too fast. I do love the solid construction, and the relative quietness of the machine. Overall I am pleased. Works very well on greens!
customer_reviews.author: deborah brandt

customer_reviews.title: also must work good with vegetables and must have optimum price
customer_reviews.text: I searched too much about issue of buying juicer. first must work low rpm & masticarting system, also must work good with vegetables and must have optimum price. several months has past to use this juicer. I bought 8008 and my friend has bought 8006. actually there is no quality,technical or performance difference between them. However i like this metalic gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty sad when my old Omega juicer died
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty sad when my old Omega juicer died, even though I'd had it for 20 years. After much research, it seemed that this Omega cold press juicer would be my best choice - and we are thrilled with it. Quiet, impossibly easy to use and clean - Omega has been doing juicing RIGHT for a long time. Total thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Name private

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought broke. It took longer than expected for the new one because omega did not process the order correctly.....BUT... This is an awesome machine! I juice every day. Problems I have are: When juicing soft things like berries or apples it turns to mush and will not strain through the filter unless something fiberouse is used as a chaser. I have not tried to make butter or noodles yet but I'm working on it. This machine will take all your greens or fruits, along with an entire marijuana plant and anything else you can think of that might benefit you.
customer_reviews.author: Abooza69

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the Omega series. I upgraded from the 8006 to the 8008. I think if you can find the 8006 cheaper, stick with that. The touted larger opening and better auger do not seem to make that big a difference to me. This juicer absolutely always extracts all the juice leaving no wet pulp. It also does a very good job juicing greens. The only negative thing and it is minor, is that juicing things like pineapples, blueberries, strawberries will have you needing to disassemble and clean out the soft pulp before you can go on juicing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kore

customer_reviews.title: Juicing happiness
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing juicer. Had for over a year and it's still juicing like the day we opened the box. Powerful, juices everything nicely. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Junkie

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. It is very easy to clean and works very well. I use it to juice wheat grass. I had it for a few months now wanted to wait and see if it hold up and so far so good. No problems with the seller arrived earlier than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: Miraj Lee Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my juicer. I would give it 6 stars if it was autonomous:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are in love with this!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely LOVE this juicer! It is perfect! I haven't attempted to use it for anything other then juice yet, but so far what I bought it for- it's perfection. *Update 12/29/2014: I used the juicer to grind coffee beans Christmas morning, it was a lot quieter then my traditional coffee grinder. It also produced a much finer and even grind. I have now decided that this will become my full time grinder for coffee as well as my daily juicer! I Love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this juicer. It does my softer fruits like grapes, cherries and pineapples as long as I follow it up with harder fruit too. It's a fantastic juicer. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: this is the best unit you can get
customer_reviews.text: Sleek enough and for the price, comparatively, this is the best unit you can get. However, the adjustable nozzle for juicing is poorly designed and if fully tightened while create enough reverse-pressure to heat fibrous greens to temperatures far above "raw" standards. Not technically a "cold press" juicer. This is a masticating juicer. And for what it claims, it does fairly well! 90% Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: All The Finest Things

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !!! I use this for fruits and veggies. Especially beets and it works fantastic !!! Yes when juicing soft fruits it could be a lil disaster. But notice I said little not major !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good juicer. Pulp is dry which means you are getting more juice
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Calloway

customer_reviews.title: We love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: We love this juicer! It gets used 1-2 times every day. Fairly easy to clean, pretty quiet, not silent, but quieter than our previous juicer. Only down side the opening is pretty narrow. All in all, great juicer!
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: Buy Two, one for gift
customer_reviews.text: Have used twice a week. Sometimes more Makes beautiful juice. Now people are dropping off their fruit and veggies for me to make for them Feel great
customer_reviews.author: Speck Kevin Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Juice green leafies with this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer for anything leafy (Spinach, kale, parsley, mint etc.) . Centrifuge juicers spin the leaves around and shoot them into the waste bin virtually unjuiced. This masticating juicer does a better job. Pretty and easy to clean and assemble. I have seen this exact juicer in professional juice shops several times. I always ask how they like it and they all love it.However, if you are juicing soft fruits (pineapple, citrus, apple) and hard veggies (carrots, celery, cuke) Use a centrifuge juicer like a Breville ...its faster and has a bigger feed tube and won't clog. Happy Juicing!
customer_reviews.author: holly hanoyan

customer_reviews.title: Making amazing juice
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing , and as a juicer and as a pasta maker 👌👌👌love it
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay antonyan

customer_reviews.title: Best Juicer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Juicer ever! Easy to use and easy to clean up. Very efficient, juice is ready in less than 5 minutes. AWESOME

customer_reviews.title: So Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong juicer, so so easy to clean! apart easy and rinse. Done! makes amazing juice! every drop!

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product. A huge step up from out old ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. A huge step up from out old centrifugal juicer.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! After using it almost everyday for about 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! After using it almost everyday for about 1 month no complaints. I'm glad we got this particular model.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and I haven't had any problems at all
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I haven't had any problems at all. I have been using it daily for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems perfect! I've used it a few times yet. I'm pretty satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Got a great deal on a refurbished (blemished) unit
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on a refurbished (blemished) unit. I could hardly tell where the slight imperfection in the chrome was. Excellent machine. Love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Butler

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is the BEST! I bought a few others and returned them
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is the BEST! I bought a few others and returned them, this one I am keeping! EASY clean up!

customer_reviews.author: Nene

product_meta.title: Omega J8008C Juicer Extractor and Nutrition Center Creates Fruit Vegetable and Wheatgrass Juice Quiet Motor Slow Masticating Dual-Stage Extraction Automatic Pulp Ejection, 200-Watt, Metallic
product_meta.description: Omega nutrition systems are "masticating-style" Juice extractors and more! A masticating juicer juices at low speeds of 80 RPM minimizing heat build-up and oxidation The auger system forces produce into a tight chamber grinding and pressing the food to squeeze out the juice from Items as fine as wheatgrass and leafy vegetables With a nutrition system You can also make all-natural nut butters baby food soy/nut milks pasta and a variety of healthy snacks
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15-YEAR coverage on parts and performance
LONGER LASTING JUICES - Using a low speed of 80 RPMs results in minimal heat buildup and oxidation promoting healthy enzymes
BOOST YOUR IMMUNITY - Cold press juicing is one of the most effective ways to easily access nutritious enzymes and antioxidants that boost immunity and enhance overall health.
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES - Extracts the maximum amount of nutrients, vitamins, taste and juice from minimum amounts of celery, carrots, leafy greens and other fruits, vegetables, or wheatgrass.
NUTRITION CENTER - Turn nuts into nut butter, extrude pasta, grind Coffee and spices, mince herbs and garlic, make baby food and frozen desserts, and whip up soy milk in a flash
FEATURES - High juice yield with very dry pulp, an automatic pulp-ejection function for continuous juicing, four stabilizing feet, and quiet operation
HIGHLIGHTS - The adjustable end cap has 5-settings for maximum juice output and extraction. Enjoy continuous juicing. Powerful motor dual-stage juicing system ensures maximum efficiency
All components included, built in handle
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. Coverage valid in North America only.

When buying, please check whether the product is "Ships from and sold by " just below the product price to make sure you are receiving this product from the manufacturer of Omega to ensure your product is honored.
Included components: Motor housing , instruction manual , juice/pulp cups (2) , plunger , cleaning brush , screen, auger, drum, hopper, adjustable end cap
